author: Sarah O'Brien
title: How to know if a pension lump sum is right for you when companies like GE offer one
description: Whether you count yourself among those former GE workers or are have a similar option on the table elsewhere, it's important to weigh the pros and cons before deciding whether to take a company up on its offer.
content:
About 100,000 ex-employees of General Electric will face a choice soon: stay in the company's pension plan or accept a lump sum and cut ties instead.
